long_description: Built for full days of outdoor fun, the boys' Keen Chandler CNX shoes remain flexible, breathable and supportive so little adventurers can scramble over trails or conquer the playground. Synthetic mesh uppers with synthetic overlays provide flexible, comfortable coverage; synthetic mesh linings wick moisture away from feet for comfort in warm weather. Single-pull lacing system delivers a snug, secure fit; heel and tongue loops allow easy on/off. Patented toe bumpers protect little toes from rocks and debris while running. EVA footbeds and midsoles provide comfortable cushioning and support. Durable rugged outsoles on the Keen Chandler CNX boys' shoes deliver reliable traction on wet or uneven terrain.
short_description: Built for full days of outdoor fun, the boys' Keen Chandler CNX shoes remain flexible, breathable and supportive so little adventurers can scramble over trails or conquer the playground.
